title: Nicodemus National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       The five historic buildings of Nicodemus are physical expressions of the five pillars that continue to anchor African American communities today - self-government, home, church, business, and education.  Brochures - Request a brochure be mailed to you. Connect with Nicodemus National Historic Site on Facebook to stay current on the events. We offer distance learning opportunities for teachers, schools, educators, and civic groups. You can sign up for a session by visiting the Center for Interactive Learning and Collaboration (CILC) website or E-mail Us. Kids and youth can be a Junior Ranger at Nicodemus National Historic Site or can be a National Park Service WebRanger! Nicodemus is a climate-friendly park in Going Green.  Centennial Intitiative 2016.
